SamPy.astronomy.fluxes.convolveSpectrum¶

SamPy.astronomy.fluxes.convolveSpectrum(wave, flux, wave2, throughput)¶

Convolve a spectrum through a filter to obtain flux. Returns also the effective wavelength of the flux distribution.

Note :

if the spectrum is shorter in wavelength than the filter transmittance curve, then sets the outside range values to zeros
Parameters:
  • wave (ndarray) – wavelength of the spectrum
  • flux (ndarray) – flux of the spectrum
  • wave2 (ndarray) – wavelength of the filter
  • throughput – normalized throughput of the filter
Tpye throughput:
 

ndarray
Returns:

effective flux, effective wavelength, flux and wavelength grid
Return type:

dictionary
